name: Mitosis (itch) (MediocreMonty)
description:
In Mitosis you play as a cell. Move your cell around and click on the food to collect it.
Use the food you've collected to make different organelles for your cell!

Upgrades
-------------------

Cytoplasm: The body of your cell, lets you place other organelles in your cell

Mitochondria: The "powerhouse of the cell", this organelle is an Energy factory

Endoplasmic Reticulum: The networks of the cell, connects the organelles to the Nucleus (the brain) of the cell so they work

Ribosomes: The Protein factories of the cell, these bad boys turn your energy into Protein

Cell Membrane: The defense of the cell, protects you from bad Food trying to hurt your cell

Vaculoes: The storage of the cell, allows you to hold more Food, Energy, and Protein

Falgella: The transportation of the cell, allows your cell to move faster

Made for Ludum Dare 45
